posts.post_content:
I am looking for a graded BL460 in either vg or vg/ex condition. I am willing to put up a PSA 6 Red Hindu as part of a trade if interested. This is the second highest graded Red Hindu I am aware of across both PSA and SGC. I know of only 1 PSA 7 (Konetchy) and only 1 PSA 6 (Davis). 

Please contact me if you would like to discuss a possible deal.

[url]mmw2161@aol.com[/url]

Jerry Totino
